instructions.sl.utf8: Pazljivo preberite vsako izjavo. Če se z izjavo strinjate, obkljukajte ustrezno polje.
instructions.en.utf8: Read each statement carefully. If you agree with the statement, than tick the appropriate checkbox.

question.sl.utf8: Znam predstaviti drugo osebo in uporabiti najosnovnejše izraze pozdravljanja.
question.en.utf8: I can introduce somebody and use basic greeting and leave-talking expressions.

question.sl.utf8: Znam postavljati preprosta vprašanja in odgovarjati nanje ter oblikovati preproste izjave, povezane s splošno znanimi temam, ter se odzivati na take izjave.
question.en.utf8: I can ask and answer simple questions, initiate and respond to the simple statements in areas of immediate need or on very familiar topics.

question.sl.utf8: Znam se preprosto in razumljivo izražati, čeprav mora sogovornik včasih ponoviti povedano ali se izraziti kako drugače in mi tako pomagati, da povem, kar hočem.
question.en.utf8: I can make myself understood in a simple way but I am dependent on my partner being prepared to repeat more slowly and rphrase what I say and to help me to say what I want.

question.sl.utf8: Znam opravljati preproste nakupe, pri katerih si lahko pomagam tudi z gibi.
question.en.utf8: I can make simple purchases where pointing or other gestures can support the verbal reference.

question.sl.utf8: Obvladam izraze za številke, količine, cene, čas.
question.en.utf8: I can handle numbers, quantities, cost and time.

question.sl.utf8: Druge znam za kaj prositi in jim tudi kaj dati.
question.en.utf8: I can ask people for things and give people things.

question.sl.utf8: Znam postavljati vprašanja (npr. o tem, kje nekdo živi; o ljudeh, ki jih poznam; rečeh, ki jih ima itn.) in znam odgovoriti na taka vprašanja, če so povedana počasi in razločno.
question.en.utf8: I can ask people questions about where they live, people they know, things they have, etc., and answer such questions addressed to me provided they are articulated slowly and clearly.

question.sl.utf8: Znam opredeliti čas z izrazi, kot so »prihodnji teden«, »prejšnji petek«, »novembra«, »ob treh«.
question.en.utf8: I can indicate time by such phrases as »next week«, »last Friday«, »in November«, »three o'clock«.

question.sl.utf8: Znam se sporazumevati pri preprostih opravkih v trgovini, na pošti ali v banki.
question.en.utf8: I can make simple transactions in shops, post offices or banks.

question.sl.utf8: Znam uporabljati javna prevozna sredstva (npr. avtobuse, vlake, taksije), vprašati po osnovnih podatkih in kupiti vozovnico.
question.en.utf8: I can use public transport: buses, trains, and taxis, ask for basic information and buy tickets.

question.sl.utf8: Znam se pozanimati o najosnovnejših podatkih glede potovanja (npr. pri potovalni agenciji).
question.en.utf8: I can get simple information about travelling.

question.sl.utf8: Znam naročiti hrano in pijačo.
question.en.utf8: I can order something to eat or drink.

question.sl.utf8: Znam opravljati preproste nakupe, pri čemer moram povedati, kaj želim; znam vprašati po ceni.
question.en.utf8: I can make simple purchases by stating what I want and asking the price.

question.sl.utf8: Znam vprašati za pot ali komu svetovati, v katero smer naj gre, če si pri tem lahko pomagam z zemljevidom ali načrtom kraja.
question.en.utf8: I can ask for and give directions using a map or plan.

question.sl.utf8: Znam pozdraviti, vprašati po počutju in se odzvati na odgovore.
question.en.utf8: I can ask how people are and how they react to news.

question.sl.utf8: Znam koga povabiti in povabilo sprejeti.
question.en.utf8: I can make and respond to invitations.

question.sl.utf8: Znam se opravičiti ali opravičilo sprejeti.
question.en.utf8: I can make and accept apologies.

question.sl.utf8: Znam povedati, kaj mi je všeč in kaj ne.
question.en.utf8: I can say what I like and dislike.

question.sl.utf8: Znam se pogovarjati o tem, kaj je treba storiti oziroma kam iti, in se dogovoriti za srečanje.
question.en.utf8: I can discuss with other people what to do, where to go and make arrangements to meet.

question.sl.utf8: Znam vprašati, kaj nekdo dela in kaj počne v prostem času.
question.en.utf8: I can ask people questions about what they do at work and in their free time, and answer such questions addressed to me.

question.sl.utf8: Preprost, neposreden pogovor o temah, ki so mi blizu ali me osebno zanimajo sem sposoben začeti, v njem dejavno sodelovati in ga tudi končati.
question.en.utf8: I can start, maintain and conclude simple face-to-face conversation on topics that are familiar or of personal interest.

question.sl.utf8: Sposoben sem sodelovati v pogovoru ali razpravi, vendar se včasih težko natančno izrazim.
question.en.utf8: I can take part in a conversation or discussion but may sometimes have difficulties with accurate interaction.

question.sl.utf8: Obvladam večino situacij, ki se pojavljajo pri rezervaciji potovanj v agencijah ali na potovanjih.
question.en.utf8: I can deal with most situations likely to arise when making travel arrangements through an agent or when actually travelling.

question.sl.utf8: Znam vprašati za pot in slediti natančnim navodilom.
question.en.utf8: I can ask for and follow detailed directions.

question.sl.utf8: Znam izraziti občutke presenečenja, sreče, žalosti, zanimanja in ravnodušja ter se primerno odzivati na izraze teh občutkov pri drugih.
question.en.utf8: I can express and respond to feelings such as surprise, happiness, sadness, interest and indifference.

question.sl.utf8: Na primeren način znam izraziti svoje (ne)strinjanje s čim.
question.en.utf8: I can agree and disagree politely.

question.sl.utf8: V pogovorih s prijatelji in z znanci znam izmenjavati osebne poglede in osebna mnenja.
question.en.utf8: I can give or seek personal views and opinions in an informal discussion with friends.

question.sl.utf8: Znam spontano začeti pogovor, v njem sodelovati, se uspešno odzivati na izjave sogovornikov in pogovor tudi končati.
question.en.utf8: I can initiate, maintain and end conversation naturally and use turn-taking effectively.

question.sl.utf8: Znam izmenjati obširne strokovne informacije s strokovnih področij.
question.en.utf8: I can exchange considerable quantities of detailed factual information on matters within my fields of interest.

question.sl.utf8: Znam izraziti čustva različnih stopenj in poudariti pomen določenih dogodkov in izkušenj.
question.en.utf8: I can convey degrees of emotion and highlight the personal significance of events and experiences.

question.sl.utf8: Aktivno lahko sodelujem pri daljših pogovorih s splošno tematiko.
question.en.utf8: I can actively engage in extended conversation on most general topics.

question.sl.utf8: V debatah znam utemeljiti, komentirati in zagovarjati svoja stališča.
question.en.utf8: I can account for and sustain my opinions in discussion by providing relevant explanations, arguments and comments.

question.sl.utf8: Znam pripomoči k nadaljevanju pogovora o znani temi, tako da npr. potrdim razumevanje povedanega ali da pozovem druge, naj nekaj povedo.
question.en.utf8: I can help a discussion along on familiar ground, confirming comprehension, inviting others to contribute, etc.

question.sl.utf8: Znam voditi vnaprej pripravljen intervju in pri tem preveriti pravilno razumevanje povedanega ter postavljati dodatna vprašanja na zanimive odgovore.
question.en.utf8: I can carry out a prepared interview, checking and confirming information, and following up interesting replies.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko sledim lahko živahnemu pogovoru med naravnimi govorci.
question.en.utf8: I can keep up with an animated conversation between native speakers.

question.sl.utf8: Tekoče in brez nesporazumov se lahko pogovarjam o številnih splošnih, strokovnih in znanstvenih temah.
question.en.utf8: I can use the language fluently, accurately and effectively on a wide range of general, professional or academic topics.

question.sl.utf8: V družabnih pogovorih se znam jezikovno prilagajati situaciji, izražati čustva, se šaliti in razumem skriti pomen.
question.en.utf8: I can use the language flexibly and effectively for social purposes, including emotional, allusive and joking usage.

question.sl.utf8: Znam jezikovno jasno in natančno izraziti svoje misli in svoja mnenja, prepričljivo zagovarjati določena stališča in se ustrezno odzivati nanje.
question.en.utf8: I can express my ideas and opinions clearly and precisely, and can present and respond to complex lines of reasoning convincingly.

question.sl.utf8: Lahko sodelujem v živahni in ne v naprej pripravljeni debati (npr. sestanek).
question.en.utf8: I can actively participate in unstructurated discussion (e.g. at meetings).

question.sl.utf8: Brez napora sodelujem v kakršnemkoli pogovoru in kakršnikoli razpravi z naravnimi govorci.
question.en.utf8: I can take part effortlessly in all conversations and discussions with native speakers.
